definition: Lushan district of Jiujiang city 九江市, Jiangxi/Mt Lushan in Jiujiang, famous as summer holiday spot
hut
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Lushan district of Jiujiang city 九江市, Jiangxi
lit. not to know the true face of Lushan Mountain/fig. can't see the forest for the trees
pinyin: bu4 shi4 Lu2 shan1 zhen1 mian4 mu4

sentences.english: But since then, Zhang never came to Lushan Mountain any more.
sentences.chinese: 但從那以後，張學良再也沒上過廬山。

sentences.english: Situated in the southern part of Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, Lushan Mountain is on the bank of Poyang Lake (1).
sentences.chinese: 廬山坐落在潘陽湖岸邊，江西省九江市內的南部。

sentences.english: Lushan Meeting was devoted to economic work.
sentences.chinese: 廬山會議前期還討論經濟工作。

sentences.english: Phil, as well as David, has been to Lushan.
sentences.chinese: 不僅大衛，菲爾也去過廬山。

sentences.english: Situated in the southern part of Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, Lushan Mountain is on the bank of Poyang Lake.
sentences.chinese: 廬山坐落在潘陽湖岸邊，江西省九江市內的南部。

sentences.english: Our company is located at the foot of the scenic Lushan of Ruichang .

sentences.english: The study of Celastraceae from Lushan and its vicinity.

sentences.english: The U-shaped glaciated valley witnesses of the fourth glacial stage in Lushan.
sentences.chinese: 谷口呈U型，是廬山第四紀冰川“漏斗”遺蹟。

sentences.english: After the New Chinese Government was founded, three important conferences were held by the Central Committee of CPC.
sentences.chinese: 新中國成立後，中共中央在廬山召開了三次重要會議。

sentences.english: Mt. Lushan truly is a museum of ancient glaciers.
sentences.chinese: 廬山真是一個古代冰川博物館。

sentences.english: Does not know the truth about the matter, just because the body in this mountain.
sentences.chinese: 不識廬山真臉孔，只緣身在此山中。

sentences.english: It lives in the flesh or your attachment to the body.
sentences.chinese: 它還是你生活的廬山真面目掛職屍體。

sentences.english: And what will that mean for people in the United States and in places like Lushan?
sentences.chinese: 這對美國和廬山等地方的人們而言意味着什麼？

sentences.english: This way, even more people came to Lushan.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣，到廬山來的人更多了。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the characteristics and effects of convalescent factors in Lushan.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查分析廬山療養地自然療養因子特點及作用。
